title: [IDEA] - Fill that doesn't include or/and/but second preferences support.
body:
First things first. I love support, I really do. But sometimes I just feel  like being assigned any other role than support. As in I don't want to preference just Mid/Top for example.

As it stands 90% of the "Fill" preference games I play end up being as support.

Would it be worth trying something like having two fills? Like a semi fill that selects all roles minus support?

Anyways just my idea.
